tit.cmt: タイトルなので説明訳括弧を削除しました。次行に補足しました。
新規統一リストに合わせました。

sen.j: 遠的（えんてき）は、全日本弓道連盟弓道競技規則によって定められた、弓道競技種目の一種。
sen.e: Enteki is one of the kyudo (Japanese art of archery) events established by the Rules of All Nippon Kyudo Federation.
Enteki (the long-distance shooting) is one of the kyudo (Japanese art of archery) events established by the Rules of All Nippon Kyudo Federation.
sen.cmt: 説明訳括弧を補足しました。
sen.e: Enteki (the long-distance shooting) is one of the kyudo (Japanese art of archery) events established by the Rules of All Nippon Kyudo Federation.

sen.j: 射距離は90m, 70m, 60m, 50mの4種あるが、現在では60mが一般的であり、ほとんどの遠的用弓道場は60mで設計されている。
sen.e: The shooting range is 90m, 70m, 60m or 50m, but currently a range of 60m is most widely used and the majority of kyudo dojo(training hall) for enteki is designed at the range of 60m.
The shooting range is 90m, 70m, 60m or 50m, but currently a range of 60m is most widely used and the majority of kyudo dojo (training hall) for enteki is designed at the range of 60m.
sen.cmt: スペース補足しました。
sen.e: The shooting range is 90m, 70m, 60m or 50m, but currently a range of 60m is most widely used and the majority of kyudo dojo (training hall) for enteki is designed at the range of 60m.

sen.j: 的中制と得点制がある。
sen.e: There are two methods of game, tekichu-sei (the accuracy system) and tokuten-sei (the point system).
There are two methods of game, tekichu-sei (the accuracy system) and tokuten-sei (the point system).
There are two methods of game, tekichu-sei (the accuracy system) and tokuten-sei (the point system).

sen.j: 遠距離に対応する為に、遠的専用の細い矢を用いる選手が多い。
sen.e: Many players use slim arrows designed exclusively for enteki, in order to deal with a long distance.
Many players use slim arrows designed exclusively for enteki, in order to deal with a long distance.
Many players use slim arrows designed exclusively for enteki, in order to deal with a long distance.

sen.j: 現在の国民体育大会弓道競技は、的中制近的競技と、得点制遠的競技 (60m) の二種から成る。
sen.e: In today's National Sports Festival, there are two types of kyudo games, tekichu-sei kinteki (the regular close-ranged shooting) and tokuten-sei enteki (60m).
In today's National Sports Festival, there are two types of kyudo games, tekichu-sei kinteki (the regular close-ranged shooting) and tokuten-sei enteki (60m).
In today's National Sports Festival, there are two types of kyudo games, tekichu-sei kinteki (the regular close-ranged shooting) and tokuten-sei enteki (60m).
